name: Python
content: I am proficient in Python and have used it extensively for backend development, data analysis, and machine learning projects. I am familiar with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.

name: Java
content: I have strong Java skills and have worked on projects using Java.

name: C++
content: I have intermediate-level skills in C++ and have used it for implementing algorithms, data structures.

name: JavaScript
content: I am proficient in JavaScript and have used it for frontend development, web applications, and server-side scripting.

name: Docker
content: I have experience with Docker and have used it for containerizing my applications, managing dependencies, and simplifying deployment processes.

name: Kubernetes
content: I have experience with Kubernetes and have used it for orchestrating containerized applications, managing clusters, and scaling applications.

name: Machine Learning
content: I have a strong understanding of machine learning concepts and have implemented various algorithms for classification, regression, clustering, and reinforcement learning. I am familiar with libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.

name: Natural Language Processing
content: I have experience with natural language processing and have worked on projects involving text classification, sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and text generation. I am familiar with libraries like NLTK, spaCy, and Gensim.

name: HTML5
content: HTML was the first language I learned when I started learning programming. Over the last 8 years, I have used it to build websites and web applications. I have experience with HTML5 APIs such as Canvas, WebSockets, and Web Workers.

name: CSS3
content: My expertise in CSS is one of the things that sets me apart from other developers. I have a deep understanding of the CSS box model, flexbox, grid, and responsive design. I have experience with CSS-in-JS libraries such as Styled Components as well as CSS preprocessors such as SASS.

name: SQL (Oracle)
content: I have experience with SQL and have used PostgreSQL for managing relational databases, writing complex queries, and optimizing database performance.

name: NumPy
content: I am proficient in NumPy, a fundamental package for scientific computing with Python. I have used NumPy for array manipulation, linear algebra, and mathematical operations.

name: Pandas
content: I am proficient in Pandas, a fast, powerful, and flexible open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. I have used Pandas for data cleaning, data exploration, and data analysis.

name: Azure
content: I have experience with Microsoft Azure, a cloud computing service. I have used Azure to deploy and manage applications, store data, and run virtual machines.

name: Kotlin
content: I have experience with Kotlin, a statically typed programming language for the Java Virtual Machine (JVM). I have used Kotlin to develop Android applications and backend services.

name: Bash
content: I have used Bash to write shell scripts for automation, system administration, and data processing.

name: Apache Spark
content: I have experience with Apache Spark, a powerful distributed computing framework. I have used it for processing large datasets, performing ETL tasks, and implementing machine learning pipelines using its MLlib library.

name: Apache Airflow
content: I have experience with Apache Airflow, a platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows. I have used it to orchestrate ETL pipelines, manage task dependencies, and automate data workflows efficiently.
